channel.title: Pages on Astrology
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Astrology

item.title: About us
item.description: Astrology.ir has been started with the aim of helping to revive Iranian style astrology with a scientific, research and computational perspective and by using the teachings of scientists such as Abu Rihan al-Biruni. In the first step, we try to publish astrological calculations on a daily basis, and in other steps, we provide the audience with its interpretations, which not only eliminates the need to refer to the almanacs, but also provides extensive information beyond the available resources.
